_NAVBAR: Below is the shit for the NAVBAR
CUSTOM_SCRIPTS_DESC: Make your own commands and scripts easily with our online script creator. *Currently only available to Subscribers*
LOWER_TIERS: All perks from the lower tiers
_COMMANDS_PAGE: Below is the shit for the commands page
NAME: Name
_FOOTER: Below is the shit for the footer
GET_CONNECTED: Get connected with us on social networks!

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: activelist
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Lists the top 5 people active people on the server

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: activeme
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays your activity value

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: avatar
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays a full res version of your avatar. (Mostly used for development purposes)

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: back
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: I'm Back!! Useful for those times when you have been away and want to make the whole chat aware of your presence

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: batman
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: You send out your help from the Dark Knight

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: butters New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Posts a random picture of Butters smiling

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: civilwar
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Removes yourself from a team

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: coin
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Flips a coin

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: dice
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Rolls a dice

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: f
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Press 'F' to pay respects

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: gif
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Plays a South Park gif of your choice. [See the list of gifs here](https://github.com/feinwarusoftware/awesom-o/wiki/Available-Gifs)

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: harvest
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Selects the next celebrity for the harvest

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: help
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: You have a 50% chance of ending up here

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: helpline
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Sends a link to a reddit thread with suicide prevention contact information

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: hmmm
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Things that make you go hmmm ðŸ¤”

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: info
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays info about AWESOM-O

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: jointeam
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Join either the Freedom Pals, Coon & Friends, or Chaos Minions. Replace team with fp, cf or cm

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: love New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays a random Chef quote

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: microaggression
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Microaggression, Hit 'em!

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: movieidea
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Adam Sandler... is forced to come up with movies.. and stuff

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: poll
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Creates a poll. Lasts 30 minutes by default. Note: [] must be included

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: random
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays a random episode

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: reminder
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to bring a towel!

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: rps
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Rock, Paper, Scissors!

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: shitlist
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Lists the top 5 people who have said 'shit' and displays the total amount from the server

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: shitme
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Counts how many times you have said 'shit'

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: sub
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Sends a link to the subreddit

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: times
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays the time in different timezones

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: welcome
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Welcomes to the server

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: wiki
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Does a South Park wiki search

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: wink
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Wonk. rawr xd

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: last.fm New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays your 5 most recent scrobbles

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: last.fm artists New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays your top artists

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: last.fm albums New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays your top albums

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: last.fm tracks New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays your top tracks

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: request music New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Adds a YouTube video or playlist to the queue. You can provide the full URL, just the video ID or full playlist URL

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: search music New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Searches for a video on YouTube and adds it to the queue

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: stop music New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Stops the playback, the bot will not continue with the pending queue until -resume is issued

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: resume music New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Allows the bot to play videos from the queue again after -stop was issued

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: now playing New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays the title of the video that is being played

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: skip music New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Skips the video that is being currently played

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: queue New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays the queue

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: clear queue New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Sets the queue to an empty state, discarding all pending requests

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: remove last New
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Deletes the last request that was added to the queue

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: activeval
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Displays someone elses activity value

COMMANDS_DESC.NAME: dick
COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Just your usual mod abuse commands

COMMANDS_DESC.DESCRIPTION: Ends the poll
